articles.author: Jordana Cepelewicz
articles.title: DNA Has Four Bases. Some Viruses Swap in a Fifth
articles.description: Dozens of viruses don't use the same four nucleotide bases found in all other life. New work shows how this is possible—and perhaps more common than we think.
